website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo Tab 2 A8's performance is typical for its size and price, but if you're strapped for cash, it's fine for casual use.
pros: The Lenovo Tab 2 A8 is an affordable tablet for surfing the Web, checking email and streaming video
The preloaded Dolby app significantly improves audio quality
It has a microSD card slot
cons: The design is thick and hefty
The 1,280x800-resolution display is low by today's standards
Large apps and games take a while to load, and performance within them is sometimes sluggish

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, with some lag
customer_reviews.text: So far pretty happy with this tablet. Good size, good screen, good sound, and good value. Almost pure android lollipop. The placement of the power button is kinda lame. But this looks like a keeper. 1 month edit: So after about a month, I am gonna have to knock off one star. I've noticed some lag recently. Not sure if its the processor, memory, or the lollipop operating system. Still a good entry level tablet though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: More bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a replacement for my 3 year old tablet that wouldn't cost too much when I found this one. I couldn't be happier with it. Where my old tablet was slow and underpowered, this one is fantastic. There is no noticeable delay when I turn it on or open apps. Everything seems to just work as it should. The screen is bright and the images crisp. The sound is excellent, too with dual speakers. The front and rear cameras both work great and I'm rediscovering the joy of taking random pictures throughout my day. If you're in the market for an 8-inch tablet you should really give this one a try.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Wilson

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT tablet for very little money!
customer_reviews.text: I only needed a tablet for social media sites and to take a few photos. This fits the bill just fine. I can't believe how long the battery lasts without needing to be charged. For me I only need to charge it once a week (my wife has one also and the same for her). Some say the camera does not take good photos, well I say they look very good. I'm sure others can take better but for a much higher price. If your looking for a tablet for web surfing, email or just a few good photos for very little money I would recommend this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet, just needs the right case.
customer_reviews.text: Everybody has already said pretty much the same thing. I am a computer geek, and if you pair this with a bluetooth keyboard you can do pretty much anything you need to with this. I highly recommend getting a good case for this. It is small enough to toss into a purse or book bag, and in fact I was able to scale down my book bag to a much smaller bag now that I am not lugging around a laptop or first gen 10" tablet. The problem with that is that it tends to get wedged between books, bounced around, etc. So, get yourself a good hard shell type case to protect the screen side.
customer_reviews.author: A concerned customer

customer_reviews.title: A great tablet for the first 5 months
customer_reviews.text: A great tablet for the first 5 months. Then it passed away while at half charge when I was overseas on vacation and really needed it as I left my laptop at home. No Lenovo warranty and Amazon only 30 days. I tried all the tricks I could find by Googling, even the ones on the Lenovo forum (where, it seems, it is not an unknown problem). I want another 8 inch tablet but I am unsure whether to go for Lenovo again. It's tempting because it was so good while it worked, but I'm not sure I want to take the cash risk.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Cosslett

customer_reviews.title: Great $99 tablet. Don't pay more for it.
customer_reviews.text: Great general purpose tablet. Compared to higher-end tablets, the screen is more sharply contrasted and tends toward cooler colors (truer reds on other devices tend to look more pinkish on this tablet). Plays app games well, runs quite cool. Stutters on high-demand apps. More likely to crash than overheat. Does basically what it should for its specs and price range which, for the record, should be $99, NOT anything higher. I don't know what these sellers are trying to pull, tacking on an extra $35 or $40 just because this model is selling well. This is a $99 tablet and at that price it's a wonderful little model. For anything more? Eh.
customer_reviews.author: L and E Family

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet, fast and good screen display
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet, fast and good screen display. Better than my new Lenovo desktop which is slower and better than my Samsung galaxy Tab 2. Also very good battery life, I can watch video's for up to 8 hrs. For the price of $99.00 I would highly recommend this tablet for watching video's and surfing the internet. The sound quality is surprisingly good too, and it's two speakers are on the front unlike some. Some cheap tablets are junk, but after taking a chance and buying this one I have no regrets. This is exactly what I was looking for, something small and portable without being too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: michael b.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet, bought it for 100 USD
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tablet, bought it for 100 USD, inside that range, it was one of the best tablets money could buy. Not a lot of bloatware, very fast, considering it's not a recent model, sound is acceptable, but with some tweaks, it's playback is improved, screen is decent enough. My father learnt how to use it in no time. Very user friendly, charging speed is not optimum, but it gives lots of hours of heavy usage.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet for the price. Sturdy and functions very well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tablet. It is holding up very well even though the case I purchased for it did not. I use this alot even more than my own smartphone. Because this is not considered a major brand some apps will take a long time to add it to their list of approved devices. My only major issue with this is the camera. It is not as good as I hoped for. It does a good enough job. Just wish it would stop turning dark on certain pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Fashion's Sense

customer_reviews.title: The Nexus 7 spoiled me...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my Nexus 7(2013) that I had dropped. I chose the Lenovo Tab2 for its size. I wanted a bigger screen so I it would be easier to play games and read while I was on the treadmill. I will keep it simple. It does seem to have the power of my Nexus 7 and was definitely not as responsive and that was frustrating. The Nexus 7 was seamless, when I touch it responded no latency. The Tab2... just a little delay navigating through apps. I was instantly disappointed so I returned it and ordered another Nexus 7. I would rather have a smaller screen with smooth action.
customer_reviews.author: Science Officer MegaDemus

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Screen brightness and quality not quite as good as iPad mini, and does not have built-in brightness adjustment (can get a free app for this). Also does not have 5Ghz AC WIFI, only 2.4Ghz. Battery life is pretty good. Overall performance very acceptable for the cost, and i added a 128GB SD card for plenty of storage, Works much better than a no-name tablet I bought at Walmart for similar cost. You could buy 4-5 of these for a comparable iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Gorbiz83

customer_reviews.title: It seems quite capable for the price
customer_reviews.text: I researched 8" tablets very thoroughly and decided on this one. It is simply an Android Tablet. They've become sort of commodity items lately, and this one doesn't truly stand out from the crowd, except that it seems quite capable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Questioning my decision.....
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this rating is too high or too low. Am running into a few, fairly simple but "incompatible" apps that ran fine on a Samsung Tab4, and now I am trying to find out how to store & retrieve documents on this super, high tech unit. My registered s/n is not recognized on Lenovo's site, therefore I can go nowhere. Seems like a simple "My Documents" folder should be an easy. Sooo, am wondering if I should have done the switch. Since I can't reach you via the site..... if there is a Lenovo person out there who can answer questions, would love to hear from you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: Mine was defective and had previously been returned. The sensor could not determine where my finger was most of the time. Also, the camera was awful, very grainy, and couldn't take a good picture. However, it felt good in the hand, and when I could get it to function, the software worked smoothly. Given the price, I would take another gamble on it, and use prime for easy returns just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer of Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Good Value And Performance For a Budget Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet for the money. Fast for a budget machine, nice bright screen, and good Dolby sounds from the speakers on face of tablet. I really like the fact that it vibrates upon turn on/turn off to verify action. Only real negative is the contact binging every time you receive an email or app notification, especially when you are listening to programming. Pleased with battery life and charging time.
customer_reviews.author: SebNpb

customer_reviews.title: All in all a very good tablet, with solid performances (in its price class) ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet for my daughter, I was looking for a cheap tablet to Skype and watch movies and clips. I was surprised, it works very well for the money, and as most Android the possibility to use SD Cards improves significantly the storage capacity (and FINALLY with android 5.0 you can WRITE on SD Cards, and not read only). All in all a very good tablet, with solid performances (in its price class) and the feeling of being sturdy and durable, with VERY good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Cosimo Pecchioli

customer_reviews.title: Amazing budget friendly tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Great table for the price. We got this as a family tablet and it works great. My son can watch you tube and we can surf the Web. I think the screen quality is great and the sound is amazing. Battery life is really good but it does take a while to charge so I just let it charge overnight so it'should not a real issue. Also start up is a bird slow but I get around that by just leaving it in sleep mode instead of turning it off. For the price this is an amazing tablet and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: This is a very basic tablet and is fine for anyone who just wants to check email or ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very basic tablet and is fine for anyone who just wants to check email or browse the internet. The thing I don't like about this tablet is that since there is only 1GB of RAM, apps will restart quite often. For example if i'm playing a game and quickly switch to check an email the game will restart. The device also restarted by itself every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: waterdancer

customer_reviews.title: I’ve bought 3 and gonna buy another.
customer_reviews.text: I only use them for YouTube but I bought one that was confiscated from airport security. I bought my second and gifted it to my mother. My third will also be gifted to my mother which was stolen from her suitcase while traveling. I’m definitely buying another. The battery is about 8 hours for video which works well.
customer_reviews.author: Biftek

customer_reviews.title: It was too easily disconnected, only a minor annoyance at first
customer_reviews.text: Zippy little entry-level tablet. Adequate graphics. Only gripe is the charging cable plug (the end that fits into the tablet) fit very loosely upon arrival. It was too easily disconnected, only a minor annoyance at first. Eventually, it started losing contact inside the tablet and had to be wiggled to charge. I had to go through several after-market cables to find one that would fit more snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: I think it is one of the best deals in the market. If you don't mind a little low resolution screen buy this tablet for 1/4th cost of an iPad. You will not regret it :) I bought one for my technologically challenged dad. He seems to be doing fine. He likes it too. Cheap yet powerful enough to handle a lot of different apps games etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Einstein Von Brainstorm

customer_reviews.title: Very poor tablet
customer_reviews.text: I've had nothing but problems with this device. The wireless constantly loses connection while using it. The screen has very poor sensitivity and is of a material that makes swiping difficult. Finally, the performance is very weak. The simplest apps lag while using them. I purchased this tablet for very basic functionality, but it cannot handle even that. Save your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cook

customer_reviews.title: Underpowered
customer_reviews.text: I don't use a tablet for much, and was not expecting this to be a stellar performer, but the performance is so awful for basic things that I end up using it even less than expected. I would recommend spending a bit more and get a tablet with more memory and better performance. I would not buy this tablet again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for a 64 bit, Lollipop tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Killer tablet at a very nice price. Lollipop is a big improvement on the already very good Android OS. The four core 64 bit cpu provides plenty of power for fast app switching. The screen looks better than expected for 1200x800 res. If Lenovo had spent a few extra bucks to install 2gb of RAM and 5.2ghz wireless this would be the perfect budget tablet. As is it is still a heck of a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The screen will flicker and it will vibrate every so often like it wants to turn on
customer_reviews.text: Bought in April, Died in Aug. One day went from 15% charge to 0% in 2 mins and would not turn on. Charged for an entire day on the original charging cable, still same issue. The screen will flicker and it will vibrate every so often like it wants to turn on. The Mfg date is 2015-12-01, it is less then a year old, used rarely (only for Nexflix or other video streaming), never dropped but will not turn on.
customer_reviews.author: B. Zeiser

customer_reviews.title: Great starter tablet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old autistic daughter. Good starter tablet for kids. Not good at multitasking. For what she uses it for it is fine. She uses it for streaming You Tube, Netflix, Plex Media Server, and plays some Paw Patrol, Yo Gabba Gabba and Sesame Street games. If you want a good fast tablet, try one with higher specs. Otherwise, this one is good for the price
customer_reviews.author: joetheplumber

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with Lenovo!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased product in Oct of 15. I was lead to believe it had a year warrant. I have been having problem with freezing up at times. I contacted Lenova about problem, the woman said it was s virus issue I'm not sure it is. I was not able to talk to tec support unless I paid a $39 dollar fee!! So I am left with a tablet that has issues. Other than that the picture is great & the sound is very good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright display and sleek design
customer_reviews.text: My initial impressions were quite good. At first i was a bit worried on its camera quality indoors as it looked a bit out of touch. It gives good quality photos in the outdoors. The display quality and the performance is good considering its price range.
customer_reviews.author: Infas J.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T LOOK ANY FURTHER!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing power and versatility in a tablet that is a joy to use. From the spacious storage -16 GB- to the intuitive and efficient Android OS, gamers, video and photo fans, and those of us who want to get serious work done rejoice in finally getting a reasonably priced, QUALITY tablet. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. I now have two of these: my own and the one I bought for my tech-challenged wife. She LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: William M. Grattan

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, wish it had sim slot, not using as often since I am not constantly connected
customer_reviews.text: Sigh! Add sim slot and I would be happier. Over seas it is easy to get a tablet with sim slot, in the US of A the carriers are the problem. Why teather and if you're on the road it would be nice to use the bigger screen. Good speed, but I find without being constantly connected I am going back to my phone most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: In Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Solid Device. Easy to Use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my senior citizen father to use as an e-reader and media device while undergoing chemo. The device is easy to use and never gave my technically intermediate father any trouble. He is still using it today post-chemo.
customer_reviews.author: Cuncabo

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: Received new, sealed in the box. Opened and turned it on, charged it and was given to my son as a present the next day. It worked for about 3 hours, and while he was playing a game on an app, the screen went black but could hear sound. Tried to turn off and turn back on/reboot several times but screen just flashes black to blue. No picture, just sound. Absolutely ruined his Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. Touch screen is very slow and unresponsive. Constantly re-booting itself. Battery drains fast but is very slow to re-charge. Very regretful that I made this purchase. Giving it one star because I couldn't give it zero.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now I am happy with this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have used this tablet for 3 weeks. Now I am happy with this tablet. The screen size is ok, not small, not big to me. The screen quality is quite good, but the sound is not loud enough. The battery power is also good, I recharge often, so I guess it can last over 3 hour use. If you want to buy a tablet with a reasonable price and high end quality, this is the right one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Yongsup Seo

customer_reviews.title: Received unit couple of days ago. Unable to adjust ...
customer_reviews.text: Received unit couple of days ago. Unable to adjust Screen Brightness, The Screen is "Bright White. It's like looking directly into a flashlight which means that I can also use it as a flashlight. I go to "Settings" - "Display" - "Brightness Level" and move the "Sliding Bar" right to left and nothing happens. Really cutting into the battery life. Maybe it's a hardware problem. This is a deal breaker for me. Will be returning it before I go blind.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet. Long battery
customer_reviews.text: Great Tablet. Long battery. Great Picture/graphics!! Only complaint is sometimes the keyboard does not type the letter you press and it does not allow you to silence the clicking of the keys while typing.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Spencer

customer_reviews.title: So Far VERY happy with the Lenovo Tab2
customer_reviews.text: So Far VERY happy with the Lenovo Tab2 Sleek look, visuals are colorful and vivid. At this point all is functioning well and as expected. Will update if any issues arise, but for now 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Liz's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tablet four months ago. It was nimble enough for about the first two months, but now the battery is drained in two hours; opening anything on line, or switching from one app to another takes way too long, and rebooting and reinstalling, etc. doesn't help. My old Dell venue lasted 2 yrs...
customer_reviews.author: J. J.

customer_reviews.title: Although the individual for whom I purchased this item likes ...
customer_reviews.text: Although the individual for whom I purchased this item likes it, the only thing I wish to say about it is just that, and nothing more. The only way Amazon permits me to convey that is for you to read this script, also.
customer_reviews.author: Doctorcr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet, excellent workhorse for the price. Not meant to be a powerhouse tablet, good for reading, video, cruising online and most games. Performs very nicely in all respects. Also takes a 32GB microSD card without issue.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: King of Tablets
customer_reviews.text: I have own several high brands and have spent lots of money on the other guys but I tell the truth This Tablet Is By Far the Best. and at a cheaper price I was not too sure if I wanted to try it. But now I will never spend on another brand when Lenovo is making such a fine tablet It has Dolby Atmos. what else can say.
customer_reviews.author: Cello

customer_reviews.title: Good budget tablet but there are cheaper options
customer_reviews.text: It's a good budget tablet but there is similar options at a lower price, i see new model is cheaper. Anyway, overall it's a good tablet, i mostly use it for youtube, checking emails, facebook and surfing the web, i play some light games too, it's lightweight and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo P.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for kids too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these devices for my twins, they were ecstatic to be relieved from the cheap tablets we bought last year (NuVision tablets, they can't even hold the charge). My kids love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Arslan

customer_reviews.title: best tablet ever  even the price is good
customer_reviews.text: Best tablet I've ever owned best sound on tablet I've ever had surround sound speakers it's a must buy great picture everything about this tablet the unit price is x excellent
customer_reviews.author: mike r clark

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet its my 2nd andits the one I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet its my 2nd andits the one I picked out from all the others. I don't have a negative word for this Lenovo tablet
customer_reviews.author: George McCloy

customer_reviews.title: Very good tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good tablet for the price..loved it. Great hardware, sound and display. I bought this for my mom and she loves playing games and watching tv on this.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul P.

customer_reviews.title: Good for most Apps, Not All
customer_reviews.text: Runs most apps I have well. However, Skype and Evernote will not run. Have not found any others that will not run...yet.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Auerbach

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Super late review...but my mom has been using this for a year now and she loves it and hasn't had any problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nique84

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid tablet
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact. Perfect for E book reading. Screen swipes responsively. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick E. Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: Very Glitchy Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Very glitchy tablet, no brightness control doesn't like to run multiple apps can not handle most games even candy crush is slow and glitchy. I am hoping mine is a lemon I will be sending it in under warranty to see if it can be fixed
customer_reviews.author: C. Goetsch

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for price. Pros: Has good GPS, 16 GB flash for holding more apps, fast for email, browsing. Cons: No compass, slippery back makes it somewhat hard to hold, takes a long time to charge fully.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Zouck

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price and the quality, I am satisfied with my purchase. I bought 2, one for each of my kids, ages 7 & 8. They love them. The picture is high quality, the sound is unbeatable. We have installed several apps and the speed has not changed. The battery life is great as well. I recommend this product! In fact, now I want one.
customer_reviews.author: KLS

customer_reviews.title: ... couple of these for some family members and they love them.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a couple of these for some family members and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: PMayes

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your Buck!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet, its great especially at this price. I works great, its fast, it looks sleek, the resolution looks amazing. Definately a good buy
customer_reviews.author: arlean pyles

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. Easy to use. Sound is good. The size is perfect, small enough to carry but large enough to see and do things on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: In the family we have 14 Kindles. I really like my Android devices and wanted to play Angry Birds 2 on the updated Lollypop, so bought the Lenovo. I was not sorry. Great speed, graphics and is easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very nice android tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice android tablet for the price. Screen looks good and feels solid, not like a flimsy plastic. Do yourself a favor and spend the extra $20 for this unit over the cheapo android tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gendreau

customer_reviews.title: Glitch
customer_reviews.text: This tablet often makes buzzing noises, then the screen goes blank.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Marshall

customer_reviews.title: but a great bargain otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Not the most reactive to touch, but a great bargain otherwise. Great for every-day browsing and apps! I use mine daily!
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Tablets very good
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Lenovo tab2 A8 tablet . It works as well as a more expensive Samsung tab . Very pleased with my purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Claude Tarbell

customer_reviews.title: Working good for 3 years now
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter and she loves it. Working good for 3 years now.
customer_reviews.author: AztekCortez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: slow after a year of use but still works well
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Speed gets slower as you add more apps. It takes more time to process functions and opening apps. Otherwise it's good.
customer_reviews.author: i-read

customer_reviews.title: Like this tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Would recommend to others looking for an inexpensive table. Pretty much just use it to go online and play a few games.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: 8 inch Lenovo Tab 2 - A8 Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tablet for my wife who totally enjoys using it. I do own another Lenovo product so I knew about the quality and reliability of the product. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: HecLar

customer_reviews.title: Received my Lenovo tablet and am pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Received my Lenovo tablet and am pleased with it. I purchased tablet to replace another tablet that no longer worked.
customer_reviews.author: JBailey

customer_reviews.title: delivered on time and works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed, delivered on time and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: WLV43

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product but is more slow than Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 in internet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow & Laggy
customer_reviews.text: Never responds to the first tap, always waiting for the tablet to respond. Laggy and slow to respond. Overall a mediocre experience.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Matthews

customer_reviews.title: naturally I have the 8" version and it's nice! I would do business with this seller again
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a 10.1" Lenovo and she loves it. So, naturally I have the 8" version and it's nice! I would do business with this seller again; in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Liles

customer_reviews.title: ... works really well and the 8 inch screen is nice.
customer_reviews.text: This works really well and the 8 inch screen is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That being said it's been great and even to watch Netflix
customer_reviews.text: Tab is just a little slow. Sometimes I'll swipe or select something and it'll take 2-3 secs before the tablet reacts. That being said it's been great and even to watch Netflix on
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F. Rundle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice tablet, had great resolution and especially love the FM radio feature. I recommend any time.
customer_reviews.author: MacJ3

customer_reviews.title: did not work right from the first, called customer ...
customer_reviews.text: did not work right from the first ,called customer support twice, the second time they transferred me to support for a fee. returned
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pezley

customer_reviews.title: I like it. I'm not a big fan of tablets ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I'm not a big fan of tablets since I don't know much about them and the only reason I bought it was to read my Quarto blood pressure cuff. I noticed it has quite a few apps that I haven't got into yet. I'm very satisfied with the 2 Lenovo products I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Fireman Dave

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product for the price and an appreciated holiday gift
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product for the price and an appreciated holiday gift. Delivery was on time and also appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: marzjosef

customer_reviews.title: Yes, buy this! Amazing deal!
customer_reviews.text: No Complaints about this Tablet that I've had for about 6 months now! So easy to use! What a great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan P Deets

customer_reviews.title: It arrived with a broken screen (the outside was not ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with a broken screen (the outside was not crocked, but the display was), and the charge it came with didn't work. It appears that the only "refurbishing" done was to make the outside clean and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: John Prusia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good display. True colors. Relatively good sound. Excellent for its price.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the money
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using it for several months now - nice improvement over previous version.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Z.

customer_reviews.title: ... I was skeptical when I ordered it sound is great screen is great battery has five hours on it ...
customer_reviews.text: Only had this one day which isn't long but its impressive I was skeptical when I ordered it sound is great screen is great battery has five hours on it sixty percent left if this is any indication got a deal paid less than this price time will tell

customer_reviews.text: My ne[hew is loving it (1st grade)! His father as well. great speed, great built.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! I wish the screen was more responsive like an iPad but for the price I am happy.

customer_reviews.title: Good Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much, however I wish the charger plugged into the bottom of the tablet rather than the top.

customer_reviews.title: good seller.
customer_reviews.text: No problem until now, good seller . . . !
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Decent low-cost tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Decent tablet. Nice screen. Fairly quick system. Screen is hard to clean (need rubbing alcohol to get all the grease off); browser is slow (even Firefox), which in part is a reflection of all the crap that most pages DL these days. Perfectly reasonable performance for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't get it if I know that the refreshing ...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't get it if I know that the refreshing rate is slow. I have to constantly reboot it to get the wifi to work. Not impress with it.
customer_reviews.author: Random Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet with excrllent price
customer_reviews.text: First of all this is great tablet . fast and reliable . I received my tablet without headphone which is very strange . hope only this have 4G connection . also must add screen protector and full body cover option as it's complesary to have them. Highly recommend this tablet ..
customer_reviews.author: abdulrehman690

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 next books and this tablet cost a little more but it is worth every dollar and then some. This is a keeper!!

customer_reviews.title: Good pad- camera issue
customer_reviews.text: I like the pad. Bought a damage package unti and the camera does not function. Overall the pad does everything I need and I like the screen but the camera doesn't function.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids love there tablets and as rough as my children are ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love there tablets and as rough as my children are with them I am very happy with how they have held up. I only give 4 stars because the volume setting could use a little adjustment as I feel if its not on High then it's hard to hear otherwise a great product with great pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is not a voice tab !!!
customer_reviews.text: I took this tablet for whatsapp, unfortunately it doesnt work on it, moreover after purchase I came to know that there are 3 versions of A8-50, I intended to buy A8-50LC however I have got A8-50F which does not have a sim card slot. Big Disappointment. everything else looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shadab Ali

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am overall pleased with this tab. It works fine for my uses. My only complaint is apps are a little slow to open. I can't complain though, it was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: rmvanir

customer_reviews.title: This is just what I was looking for, I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for, I use this tablet mainly for watch videos and I haven't had any problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for the price. I would recommend this one for any age group.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: but it's actually a bit large for my hand to easily handle. The camera is good
customer_reviews.text: I thought the 8-inch would be nicer than a 7-inch, but it's actually a bit large for my hand to easily handle. The camera is good, when the light is sufficient. Since there is no flash, indoor pictures can be rather grainy. But outside photos are great. The tablet has met all my expectations so far. Just one thing I can't find adjustment for is the vibrational feedback when I am typing in some applications, and it seems to require a rather hard TAP to register the punch of a letter / number. But the sound is terrific and the HD look of the screen is very good. I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: P. Luttrell

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't last as long as I would like. Picture quality is good
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for personal use. Battery doesn't last as long as I would like. Picture quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet I've bought
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tablet for my brother and he absolutely loved it! He's had it for months now and still works great it hasn't needed any fixing at all! The size of the screen is great to video call or just watch your favorite videos. My brother uses this for school work and says he wouldn't trade it for anything else. The picture and visual quality is spectacular pretty sharp images and the camera takes very nice photographs. I will definitely purchase another one of this tablets for my other brother.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Rios

product_meta.title: Lenovo Tab2 A8, 8-Inch 16 GB Tablet (Navy Blue)
product_meta.description:
With the Lenovo ZA030046US, you never have to be away from your movies or gaming - wherever you go. You can take it to work, use it for navigation or even for streaming music in the car. With an 8” HD IPS Screen and Front-facing Stereo Speakers enhanced with Dolby Atoms 3D cinema sound, the ZA030046US is your best entertainment companion when waiting in lines, riding the subway, relaxing at a cafe, or even working out at the gym.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Android 5.0 Lollipop, 8-inches HD(1280 x 800) IPS with Capacitive touchscreen
16 GB Flash Memory, 1GB LPDDR3 RAM Memory
